CanDrive.description:
SANDBOX [Shared] Called when a player attempts to drive a prop via Prop Drive

[Player] ply
  The player who attempted to use Prop Drive.

[Entity] ent
  The entity the player is attempting to drive

CanProperty.description:
SANDBOX [Shared] Controls if a property can be used or not.

[Player] ply
  Player, that tried to use the property

[string] property
  Class of the property that is tried to use, for example - bonemanipulate

[Entity] ent
  The entity, on which property is tried to be used on

CanTool.description:
SANDBOX [Shared] Called when a player attempts to fire their tool gun. Return true to specifically allow the attempt, false to block it.

[Player] ply
  The player who attempted to use their toolgun.

[table] tr
  A trace from the players eye to where in the world their crosshair/cursor is pointing. See TraceResult structure

[string] tool
  The tool mode the player currently has selected.

ContentSidebarSelection.description:
SANDBOX [Client] 

[Panel] parent
  The panel that holds spawnicons and the sidebar of spawnmenu

[Panel] node
  The item player selected

ContextMenuCreated.description:
SANDBOX [Client] 

[Panel] g_ContextMenu
  The created context menu panel

PlayerGiveSWEP.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called when a player attempts to give themselves a weapon from the Q menu. ( Left mouse clicks on an icon )

[Player] ply
  The player who attempted to give themselves a weapon.

[string] weapon
  Class name of the weapon the player tried to give themselves.

[table] swep
  The swep table of this weapon, see SWEP structure

PlayerSpawnEffect.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular effect or not.

[Player] ply
  The player that wants to spawn an effect

[string] model
  The effect model that player wants to spawn

PlayerSpawnNPC.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular NPC or not.

[Player] ply
  The player that wants to spawn that NPC

[string] npc_type
  The npc type that player is trying to spawn

[string] weapon
  The weapon of that NPC

PlayerSpawnObject.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called to ask whether player is allowed to spawn any objects.

[Player] ply
  The player in question

[string] model
  Modelname

[number] skin
  Skin number

PlayerSpawnProp.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called when a player attempts to spawn a prop from the Q menu.

[Player] ply
  The player who attempted to spawn a prop.

[string] model
  Path to the model of the prop the player is attempting to spawn.

PlayerSpawnRagdoll.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called when a player attempts to spawn a ragdoll from the Q menu.

[Player] ply
  The player who attempted to spawn a ragdoll.

[string] model
  Path to the model of the ragdoll the player is attempting to spawn.

PlayerSpawnSENT.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called when a player attempts to spawn an Entity from the Q menu.

[Player] ply
  The player who attempted to spawn the entity.

[string] class
  Class name of the entity the player tried to spawn.

PlayerSpawnSWEP.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called when a player attempts to spawn a weapon from the Q menu. ( Mouse wheel clicks on an icon )

[Player] ply
  The player who attempted to spawn a weapon.

[string] weapon
  Class name of the weapon the player tried to spawn.

[table] swep
  Information about the weapon the player is trying to spawn, see SWEP structure

PlayerSpawnVehicle.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular vehicle or not.

[Player] ply
  The player that wants to spawn that vehicle

[string] model
  The vehicle model that player wants to spawn

[string] name
  Vehicle name

[table] table
  Table of that vehicle, containing info about it

PlayerSpawnedEffect.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called after the player spawned an effect.

[Player] ply
  The player that spawned the effect

[string] model
  The model of spawned effect

[Entity] ent
  The spawned effect itself

PlayerSpawnedNPC.description:
SANDBOX [Server] 

[Player] ply
  The player that spawned the NPC

[Entity] ent
  The spawned NPC itself

PlayerSpawnedProp.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called when a player has successfully spawned a prop from the Q menu.

[Player] ply
  The player who spawned a prop.

[string] model
  Path to the model of the prop the player is attempting to spawn.

[Entity] entity
  The entity that was spawned.

PlayerSpawnedRagdoll.description:
SANDBOX [Server] Called after the player spawned a ragdoll.

[Player] ply
  The player that spawned the ragdoll

[string] model
  The ragdoll model that player wants to spawn

[Entity] ent
  The spawned ragdoll itself

PlayerSpawnedSENT.description:
SANDBOX [Server] 

[Player] ply
  The player that spawned the SENT

[Entity] ent
  The spawned SENT

PlayerSpawnedSWEP.description:
SANDBOX [Server] 

[Player] ply
  The player that spawned the SWEP

[Entity] ent
  The SWEP itself

PlayerSpawnedVehicle.description:
SANDBOX [Server] 

[Player] ply
  The player that spawned the vehicle

[Entity] ent
  The vehicle itself
